body_html:
Successfully reproed. And yes, it looks like the dynamic dependencies are setup correctly:

(/Users/ezyang/Dev/pytorch-cuda-env) macbook-pro-97:pytorch-cuda ezyang$ otool -L torch/_C.cpython-36m-darwin.so 
torch/_C.cpython-36m-darwin.so:
	@rpath/libshm.dylib (compatibility version 0.0.0, current version 0.0.0)
	@rpath/libcudart.9.2.dylib (compatibility version 0.0.0, current version 9.2.64)
	@rpath/libnvToolsExt.1.dylib (compatibility version 0.0.0, current version 1.0.0)
	@rpath/libcaffe2.dylib (compatibility version 1.0.0, current version 1.0.0)
	@rpath/libcaffe2_gpu.dylib (compatibility version 1.0.0, current version 1.0.0)
	/usr/lib/libSystem.B.dylib (compatibility version 1.0.0, current version 1252.50.4)
